scriptLines:
query: 'select 
src_Store_Location_ID
,src_Store_Name
,src_Store_Address
,src_Store_Open_Time
,src_Store_Close_Time
,src_State_Name
,tgt_Store_Location_ID
,tgt_Store_Name
,tgt_Store_Address
,tgt_Store_Open_Time
,tgt_Store_Close_Time
,tgt_State_Name
,tgt_FLAG
,Loc_Dim_Key
,DM_CREATE_DATE
,src_md5
,tgt_md5
,case when tgt_Store_Location_ID is NULL or src_md5 <> tgt_md5 then 'Y' end flag_new
,case when tgt_Store_Location_ID is not NULL and src_md5 <> tgt_md5 then 'N' end flag_deactivate
from ( 
select 
A.Store_Location_ID as src_Store_Location_ID,
A.Store_Name as src_Store_Name,
A.Store_Address as src_Store_Address,
A.Store_Open_Time as src_Store_Open_Time,
A.Store_Close_Time as src_Store_Close_Time,
A.State_Name as src_State_Name,
B.Store_Location_ID as tgt_Store_Location_ID,
B.Store_Name as tgt_Store_Name,
B.Store_Address as tgt_Store_Address,
B.Store_Open_Time as tgt_Store_Open_Time,
B.Store_Close_Time as tgt_Store_Close_Time,
B.State_Name as tgt_State_Name,
B.FLAG as tgt_FLAG,
B.Loc_Dim_Key,
cast(getdate() as date) as DM_CREATE_DATE,
HashBytes('MD5',concat(cast(A.Store_Name as varchar),cast(A.Store_Address as varchar),cast(A.Store_Open_Time as varchar),cast(A.Store_Close_Time as varchar),cast(A.State_Name as varchar))) as src_md5,
HashBytes('MD5',concat(cast(B.Store_Name as varchar),cast(B.Store_Address as varchar),cast(B.Store_Open_Time as varchar),cast(B.Store_Close_Time as varchar),cast(B.State_Name as varchar))) as tgt_md5
from HR.location_dim A 
left Join HR.location_dim1 B on 
A.Store_Location_ID = B.Store_Location_ID
AND B.FLAG = 'Y'
)a',
source1, source2, source3 union(byName: true)~> union1

text.value:
@concat('update hr.config set 
        startdate = ''',variables('StartDate'),''',
        enddate = ''', utcNow(), ''',
        status = ''success'', 
 source = ''', activity('Copy data1').output.rowsread,''', 
target = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied, ''' where sourcetable = ''', item().sourcetable, '''')
@concat('update hr.config set status= ''failed''',' where activeflag=1 and status is null')

scripts.text: update hr.config set status=null where activeflag=1
